reviewText: This is a good thought provoker! Even though it is in black and white, the film conveys the wise message not to "marry in haste and repent at leisure. More time should be given to young people to teach them the foundational, time-tried truths so they can live peaceable lives and not have "shipwrecks". Truth will out.....always!  Why not learn wisdom and save yourself trouble in the future? Search for truth in all areas of life so that you can avoid pitfalls, trouble, and heartbreak.  There is no other truth but what you find in the Bible.
